data.name: Skeleton Troubles
data.detailed_description:
Skeleton troubles Have you ever wondered what happens to all skeleton enemies in video games after they die? Now you have to experience it the hard way! Playing as the skeleton, collect bones and hearts scattered across different levels so that he can restore his power and resurrect again and teach all his enemies a lesson. Only the most agile and careful skeleton will be able to sneak past all the deadly traps and dangerous enemies on the way to the last level. Can you cope with this task?

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics
- Nice soundtrack

data.short_description: Skeleton troubles - This platformer will put on your shoulders an unusual task - resurrect your skeleton hero, collecting bones and hearts in the dungeon so that he regains his strength and teach all his enemies a lesson. Jump over the spikes, dodge the cunning slugs that will shoot at you and run to victory!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 85 MB available space
